Linear Model Plot for any Pollutant & Monitor(s)

Source: R/plot.R
plot_lm.Rd

Linear Model Plot for any Pollutant & Monitor(s)

Usage

plot_lm(data, title, xlab, ylab, caption)

Arguments

data

Pollutant Dataset. Must be in 'Date | Quant | BAM' form.

title

Title of the plot.

xlab

X axis label.

ylab

Y axis label.

caption

Equation caption.

Value

A Linear Model ggplot
